description: This course will cover tuning your guitar, every note on the fretboard, finger exercises to increase speed and finger strength, all major and minor chords, and learning the Bar Chord. You'll be impressing your friends in no time! Most importantly, this course will teach you the basics of playing guitar, but also get you excited to learn more! The best part about playing guitar is that there is always more to learn!
title: How To Play Guitar - Everything You Need To Know To Start
